summary: Physician Assistant Jillian G. Goles was charged with unprofessional conduct, habitual abuse of controlled substances, and failing to cooperate with a Board investigation. Allegations included self-prescribing Adderall, altering her own medical records, and prescribing controlled substances to non-patients and family members without proper supervision. As a result, her license is suspended for a minimum of one year, and she must enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program.
